Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class MorphologicGradientImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.MorphologicGradientImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseInPlace

    public class MorphologicGradientImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBaseInPlace
    Morphologic Gradient Image. In mathematical morphology and digital image processing, a morphological gradient is the difference between the dilation and the erosion of a given image. It is an image where each pixel value (typically non-negative) indicates the contrast intensity in the close neighborhood of that pixel. It is useful for edge detection and segmentation applications. References: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Morphological_gradient
